name: The Last Mission of Yuri (Yuanfan Yang)
name_original: The Last Mission of Yuri (Yuanfan Yang)
description:
The Last Mission of Yuri is a project of NYU game center game studio 2 class. It is a game that combines the brutalism architectural aesthetics, spatial maze and narrative. In the game, players solve puzzles by changing the gravity of the space, and experience the story in the process.

Credits:

Yuanfan, Yangying, Nate, Laura


Layout:
